short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Boxy game, It's so fun.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Boxy" is a simple and fun platform game in which you must navigate by jumping over obstacles to earn points. With a quick click on the extension icon, the game opens in a small popup window. This allows you to play while working on Chrome without disrupting your workflow. You can record your hi-score also.

Controls: Press the "Spacebar" to start or pause the game, and use the "Up Arrow" to jump over obstacles.

You can donate me by clicking the coin icon; it will help me create more fun games in the future.
